height: int of blocks index in chain

transactions.tx_id: unique identifier via sha256 of all inputs and outputs

inputs.previous_output: None (Has no previous output to point to)
inputs.signature_script: None (Has no requirements to meet to generate coins)

outputs.value: value of coinbase reward
outputs.pk_script: P2PK of miner

transactions.tx_id: hash of dict with all inputs and outputs
transactions.locktime: unix time in seconds until outputs are valid

inputs.signature_script: Conditions that satisfy output's pubkey script
Conditions that satisfy output's pubkey script
Conditions that satisfy output's pubkey script

outputs.value: value of output in 100 millionths of a coin
outputs.pk_script: Conditions that must be met to redeem this output stored in a list
